flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: BRELOOM closes in on its foe with lightnand sprightly footwork, then throwsnpunches with its stretchy arms.fThis POKéMON’s fighting technique putsnboxers to shame.
The seeds ringing BRELOOM’s tail arenmade of hardened toxic spores. It isnhorrible to eat the seeds.fJust taking a bite of this POKéMON’snseed will cause your stomach to rumble.
It scatters spores from holes in the capnon its head. It loves warm and humidnclimates. It feeds on trees and plants innfields and forests.
The seeds on its tail are made of toxicnspores. It knocks out foes with quick,nvirtually invisible punches.
The seeds on its tail are made of toxicnspores. It knocks out foes with quick,nvirtually invisible punches.
Its short arms stretch when itnthrows punches. Its technique isnequal to that of pro boxers.
Its short arms stretch when itnthrows punches. Its technique isnequal to that of pro boxers.
Its short arms stretch when itnthrows punches. Its technique isnequal to that of pro boxers.
It scatters poisonous spores andnthrows powerful punches while itsnfoe is hampered by inhaled spores.
It scatters poisonous spores andnthrows powerful punches while itsnfoe is hampered by inhaled spores.
Ses petits bras s’étendent quand ilndonne un coup de poing. Son talentnégale celui d’un boxeur pro.
Its short arms stretch when itnthrows punches. Its technique isnequal to that of pro boxers.
Ses petits bras s’étendent quand ilndonne un coup de poing. Son talentnégale celui d’un boxeur pro.
Its short arms stretch when itnthrows punches. Its technique isnequal to that of pro boxers.
Its short arms stretch when itnthrows punches. Its technique isnequal to that of pro boxers.
Its short arms stretch when itnthrows punches. Its technique isnequal to that of pro boxers.
みじかい　うでは　パンチを　だすときnぐーんと　のびる。プロボクサーnかおまけの　テクニックを　もつ。
짧은 팔은 펀치를 날릴 때n쑤-욱 늘어난다. 프로 복서를n압도하는 기술을 가지고 있다.
Ses petits bras s’étendent quand il donne un coupnde poing. Son talent égale celui d’un boxeur pro.
Seine kurzen Arme dehnen sich aus, wenn esnzuschlägt. Seine Technik ähnelt der von Profi-Boxern.
Sus cortos brazos se expanden cuando da puñetazos.nTiene una técnica pugilística muy depurada.
Tirando pugni, i suoi cortissimi arti si allungano. Usanuna tecnica simile a quella dei pugili professionisti.
Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Itsntechnique is equal to that of pro boxers.
短い　腕は　パンチを　出すときnグーンと　伸びる。プロボクサーn顔負けの　テクニックを　持つ。
どくの　ほうしを　ばらまきnすいこんで　くるしむ　あいてにnきょうれつな　パンチを　くらわせる。
독 포자를 뿌려n들이마시고 괴로워하는 상대에게n강렬한 펀치를 날린다.
Il frappe de toutes ses forces ses ennemis étourdisnpar ses spores empoisonnées.
Erst lässt es den Gegner seine giftigen Sporenneinatmen, dann traktiert es ihn mit Boxschlägen.
Esparce esporas venenosas muy nocivas y asestanpuñetazos de gran intensidad a sus enemigos.
Sparge spore tossiche con orribili effetti sul nemiconche le respira, e aggiunge una scarica di pugni.
It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerfulnpunches while its foe is hampered byninhaled spores.
毒の　胞子を　ばらまきn吸いこんで　苦しむ　相手にn強烈な　パンチを　くらわせる。
かろやかな　フットワークで　てきに　ちかづきnのびちぢみする　うでで　パンチを　くりだす。nボクサー　かおまけの　テクニックの　もちぬし。
경쾌한 풋워크로 적에게 다가가n늘었다 줄었다 하는 팔로 펀치를 날린다.n복서가 무색할 만할 테크닉의 소유자다.
Chapignon se rapproche de son ennemi en se servant denson jeu de jambes, puis donne des coups de poing avecnses bras élastiques. La technique de combat de ce Pokémonnest digne des meilleurs boxeurs.
Mit leichtfüßiger Beinarbeit nähert sich Kapilz seinen Feindennund schlägt dann mit seinen dehnbaren Armen um sich.nDie Kampftechnik dieses Pokémon treibt Profiboxern dienSchamesröte ins Gesicht.

Breloom se acerca al enemigo realizando un juego de piernasnágil y enérgico. Y, a continuación, le da unos puñetazos connlos brazos elásticos que tiene. Las técnicas de lucha que usandejan en ridículo al boxeador más profesional.
Breloom si avvicina al nemico con passettini leggeri e veloci,npoi sferra scariche di pugni con gli elastici arti superiori.nLe sue tecniche di lotta superano quelle dei pugili più esperti.
Breloom closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork,nthen throws punches with its stretchy arms. This Pokémon’snfighting technique puts boxers to shame.
軽やかな　フットワークで　敵に　近づきn伸び縮みする　腕で　パンチを　繰り出す。nボクサー　顔負けの　テクニックの　持ち主。
シッポの　タネは　どくの　ほうしが　かたまってnできた　ものなので　たべたら　たいへんだ。nひとくちで　おなかが　グルグル　なりだすぞ。
꼬리의 씨앗은 독 포자가 굳어져n생긴 것이라 먹으면 큰일 난다.n한 입만 먹어도 배 속에서 부글부글 소리가 난다.
Les graines autour de la queue de Chapignon sont des sporesntoxiques. Elles sont totalement immangeables. Une simplenbouchée d’une graine de ce Pokémon peut causernde grandes douleurs à l’estomac.
Die Samen am Schweif von Kapilz bestehen ausngehärteten Giftsporen. Man sollte sie lieber nichtnessen. Ein einziger Bissen davon kann eine heftigenMagenverstimmung hervorrufen.
Las semillas que Breloom tiene prendidas de la cola estánnformadas por sólidas esporas tóxicas. Comérselas puedenresultar fatal. Hasta el más mínimo bocado puede hacertenpolvo el estómago.
I semi sulla punta della coda di Breloom sono costituiti danspore tossiche indurite. Se ingeriti hanno un effetto orribile,ninfatti un solo morso a questi semi crea gravi disturbinallo stomaco.
The seeds ringing Breloom’s tail are made of hardened toxicnspores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of thisnPokémon’s seed will cause your stomach to rumble.
シッポの　タネは　毒の　胞子が　固まってnできた　ものなので　食べたら　大変だ。n一口で　お腹が　グルグル　鳴りだすぞ。
